content.body: zcorpan: Where do you stand on this now? https://github.com/w3c/mathml-core/issues/142 ?  I really wish that we had people from the  browsers in the WG, core meets only once a month and not even every month - probably 10 meetings a year

content.body: there's one next monday, if you want to come
this is the one thing that is relevant to a lot - we had to drop it from level 1, but it would be so great to just sort it out once and for all
bkardell: happy to hop on a call if I don't have a conflict
